name: Skunk Jump
description:
SPACE =Jump

 R= Replay*

Hooray - a marvelous Essential Worker - All hail the NHS!  

Keep them safe from those ambling mustelids to avoid causing a stink .

Still not enough hours in the day for what I'd like to do, didn't get as far as randomising the spawns, doing a walk on etc. Want to learn how  to include some kind of  win condition, loose screen, score keeping etc. 

But have enjoyed myself & learned a fair bit... 

Have managed to hack together a replay option and explore Unity's animation & particle/sound FX a little.

*Figuring out how to add UI is next on the list for future projects,,, Menus, buttons and scores, Oh my!

WK3-Unity Create with Code Summer 2020
